title: Question 7
prompt:
Sentence 13: If I were in a position to hire Amanda again, I would certainly consider them for any appropriate position.

Which correction should be made to sentence 13?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
In this sentence, the pronoun “them” doesn’t match its antecedent, or the word that it refers to. The word “them” doesn’t match “Amanda,” the person the writer would consider rehiring. The word “them” is talking about “Amanda,” but “them” is plural, and Amanda is only one person. Changing the pronoun “them” to “her” makes the sentence consistent and clear.


If I were in a position to hire Amanda again, I would certainly consider her for any appropriate position.
